special_text:
[+1]: Surveil 1. You gain 1 life. [i](To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
[-2]: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch.
[-7]: Each opponent gets an emblem with “Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, you lose the game.” For each card in your graveyard, create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch.
